revised_title: Sir George Everest: A Pioneering Figure in the Survey of India
tldr: The article discusses the life and work of Sir George Everest, a prominent figure in the Survey of India. He played a crucial role in the Great Trigonometrical Survey, which laid the foundation for the national survey network of India. His contributions include determining the positions and heights of mountains, setting up visual telegraph lines, and developing innovative surveying techniques. Everest's work had a significant impact on the field of surveying and mapping in India.
